divs: sighting detailsat approx 10:15 pm i saw a yellowish \orange glowing light in the southwest sky above emmett idaho about 5-10 minutes before the fire works show started at first i thought it was a plane but the light was too large and did not appear to move whatsover after observing the light for 10 minutes i looked away for a about a minute and when i looked back up the light was gone! i searched the entire sky and saw no trace of it.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Emmett
There were no other sightings in Emmett on or around July 4th 2012
